modalTypes.fieldDescription: Select the type of modal to display. Choosing 'Form Modal' will include a form container component for adding form fields, followed by an area for additional text
modalTypes.name: ./modalTypes

additionalText.fieldDescription: Additional text to be displayed after the form
additionalText.name: ./additionalText

text.fieldDescription: The text to display on the button.
text.name: ./buttonText

linkURL.fieldDescription: Enter the URL for the link. Use a full URL for external links (e.g., 'https://www.example.com'), a relative path for internal links (e.g., '/content/page.html'), or an anchor name prefixed with '#' for in-page navigation (e.g., '#section1'). Ensure the correct format is used for the link to function properly.
linkURL.name: ./linkURL

analytics.emptyText: Please configure the data Section for Analytics.
analytics.fieldDescription: Please configure the data Section for Analytics tracking.
analytics.name: ./dataSection
